headline: 3 Red-Hot Growth Stocks to Buy in 2025
summary: 2024 was another great year for growth stocks.  Reddit remains a relatively new public company, having just debuted via an initial public offering in March 2024.  In short, Reddit is delivering in a big way in its first few months as a public company.
